pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate Synthetic Data from Statistical Models // Generate synthetic time series from commonly used statistical models, including linear, nonlinear and chaotic systems. Applications to testing methods can be found in Jiang, Z., Sharma, A., Johnson, F. (2019) doi:10.1016/j.advwatres.2019.103430 and Jiang, Z., Sharma, A., Johnson, F. (2020) doi:10.1029/2019WR026962 associated with an open-source tool by Jiang, Z., Rashid, M. M., Johnson, F., Sharma, A. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2020.104907.
